text:
Visio Conferencing: Major UX/UI improvements across all platforms, including Join/Leave/Rejoin calls, use app and Return to calls, Zoom on shared screens, Horizontal mode, memorise visio backgrounds.
Parallel Calls: Ability to run multiple calls simultaneously using ONE single account on different devices.
Message Co-Edition with attachments.
Uploads: Attach up to 30 items per message.
Bold Text: Use ** before and after text to highlight it as bold.
Bug Fixes & Other Improvements.

View-Only Sharing with Watermarks on Images & PDFs: Major feature preventing picture-taking on highly confidential items. Screenshots are already disabled.
Privately share your Secret Phrase with an IT Administrator during Sign Up or when required: 1st step toward the upcoming Admin Console.
Bug Fixes & Other UX/UI Improvements.

Enhanced Share Extension : Easily share Images & PDFs in View-Only mode with Watermarks â€” from various apps into SHAREKEY. Major feature preventing picture-taking on highly confidential items. Screenshots are already disabled.
Bug Fixes & Other UX/UI Improvements.

Broadcast Channel: Major feature for sharing content with a large audience. Members can no longer send messages and start group calls. Classic Channels can be converted into Broadcast Channels, and vice versa.
Reader Mode in Channel: Display only the essentials and focus on what matters (see Channel Settings).
Dividers & Quotes: Improve your communications by adding visual separators & quoted text.
Data Residency / On-Premise Switcher on Sign-In Screen: Allow Sharekey rollout in new European countries (coming soon).
Bug Fixes & Other UX/UI Improvements.

Reader Mode : Added to Directs.
External Links : Apply custom watermark for enhanced privacy.
Grant Access All : Added in Item Info.
Company and Discover : Filter your Contacts.
Italic Messages: Use * before & after text to highlight it as ITALIC.
Multiple UI changes (buttons, fonts, modals).
Data Residency : Added UI elements when app hosted in other countries (being rolled out)
Bug fixes & other improvements.
Major Software Upgrade (libraries & SDK) enhancing overall security.
